name: Pokémon: A Grand Day Out
summary: In this game, you will be a young trainer. One morning, you were woken up by the noise of explosions. The atmosphere was so confused at that time. At lunchtime, you decided to find out what are the reasons. Giovanni and his Team Rocket are having more unusual behaviors than normal. Finally, you found out that they are trying to catch a Cubone by blowing up all of Route 1!
